content_descriptors.notes: This game may include content not appropriate for all ages: including some in-text descriptions of violence and mild depictions of blood and gore.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3210
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game primarily supports 16:9 aspect ratio resolutions.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon R7 265
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game primarily supports 16:9 aspect ratio resolutions.
